评论详情: Love it! Simple, practical, and super nice quality. It’s also aesthetically pleasing.

The wallet is simple and practical, but doesn't skimp out on quality or craftmanship. While it's not the slimmest wallet out there, its seamless design cuts down on a lot of bulk that more standard wallets have, making it perfect for someone who wants a more minimalistic wallet but carry more than just a few cards. Even the packaging is well thought out; making sure your wallet arrives in mint condition while also providing you with the instructions to get it ready to use. It was also delivered quickly and came with a nice key ring in the same color as my wallet. Very happy with my purchase and definitely recommend it!

I was excited to purchase this wallet only to find out that it was not at all what I was expecting. The craftsmanship seems very nice but overall this seemed very poorly executed. my cards would fall out and it was more bulkier than i was expecting.

Love me this seamless leather wallet! The colour I picked is black, and boy am I thrilled to finally get it on my hands!  Quality and build is amazing, the compartments are plenty enough for my cards and cash, as it should! It still amazes me how it doesn’t take any glue or sewing to make this wallet, yet it holds up so nicely 😂
Good quality leather and nice design👍

This is a very well made product. Plenty of room for cards, cash and receipts. The quality of the leather and workmanship is brilliant, and all for a great price. Arrived well packaged, ahead of time and included a free gift- a nice leather key ring. Highly recommended.

I bought this wallet after watching a recommendation from Jon Gadget on YouTube. I wasn't disappointed, it's made from a single piece of vegetable tanned leather, that you fold into a unique wallet shape and hold together with press studs. Instructions are supplied by the team that came up with this design The quality of the leather is amazing and there are no stiches that could fray over time. I would recommend this product, if you are looking for an unusual but still functional wallet for your cards and money.

Vorab, ich hab es verschenkt. Das mit dem zusammenfalten ist echt ne coole Idee. Man muss beim Gebrauch natürlich etwas umdenken aber man gewöhnt sich schnell dran. Irgendwann kommt dann der Used Look und der Geruch vom Leder bleibt recht lang erhalten. Geiles Teil für einen guten Preis.

Carteira de boa qualidade, unisexo e com aspecto que pode ser apreciado por pessoas com gostos distintos.  Enquadra-se perfeitamente nos estilos aventureiro, prático, rústico, elegante, etc. Combina bem com estilo elegante/sofisticado onde haja uma utilização de outros apontamentos de pele semelhante, por exemplo, em blusões, sapatos, pulseiras de relógio, etc.  Com o tempo torna-se ainda melhor.  O espaço é como o anunciado e é muito prática. Se não estiver demasiado cheia, pode ser usada no bolso da frente sem problema.

Me gusta esta cartera, es muy pequeña y compacta, puedo guardar en ella todos mis documentos y cuantas tarjetas. Además, al ser de piel natural, tiene el aspecto y el tacto de un producto de primera calidad.

This is a fabulous wallet - beautifully made, very high quality leather and incredibly easy and unobtrusive to carry. Was delivered very quickly, much quicker than originally quoted - took only a week to deliver to the UK. A very clever design, with no stitching to unravel and made from a single piece of leather. I also received a free gift of a matching leather key fob, which was much appreciated! Brilliant, and highly recommended.

Bought as a gift and it was an instant hit. Comes flat packed so you can see how it folds together, the leather is beautiful and whilst quite hard to begin with softens with use.  There are enough pockets to hold cards, notes and a few coins with no issues and everything is secure whilst still being surprisingly thin and light. Highly recommended.

The wallet and the team behind it are second to none. The wallet is simple, minimalistic and yet so practical. It’s a pleasure to carry, it’s quickly become my new everyday carry with three compact but really useful pockets which have lots of space for cards or cash. The quality and craftsmanship are superb. The leather is such that the wallet will only get better with age. The service, excellent with international delivery within 24hrs. The team also included a free gift of 2 key rings which was so kind, made with the same high standards. Again simple but very practical. Overall superb, I’ve already started to recommend crazy horse crafts to family and friends. I will be using this team again. Thank you crazy horse crafts!
I have been looking for a minimalist wallet and this lives up to all my expectations. Holds just what I need. Lovely and soft to the touch, presented wonderfully and great delivery.
